answers.answer: Yayy.. Can't wait to be in double digits in another 2ish weeks.
Congrats! :) once I hit double digits every 10th day I would get so excited lol. I now have 29 days left and can't wait to meet my son.

my whole pregnancy has flown by but once I hit double digits it REALLY started going fast lol I can't wait to meet my princess next month! I have 44 days until my due date but will probably be getting induced early because of my gestational diabetes. Good luck and congrats!
I completely agree with Makayla213! Lol I have 77 days left but it seems like time has started slowing down.
Awe I remember when I got under 100 I was so excited lol... but now I have 54 days left til my due date so like 47 til my csection... starting to get nervous for some reason lol.
Yay!! It's going to go by sooo fast. I have 26 days left. (:

Congrats to all you mommies who are so close! I'm so excited and nervous!!! Even though this is my second pregnancy this will be the first that I won't have my husband by my side when I deliver (he is deployed). It's been tough without him here but I'm excited that soon I'll get to hold another little princess in my arms and her older sister might jot know what's going on yet but I'm hoping she loves her sister and isn't the jealous one
I agree with smhsince91 I have 77 days left to n it has now seemed to slow down :( maybe because I'm so excited its getting so close I just can't wait to meet my princess :)
I have a 9 month old that helps make the days go by faster

question: 99 days left until my second princess is born!!! :)
title: finally in the double digits!!!
